EmailTemplate.name: AIA RX Carve-Out Rejection
EmailTemplate.subject: Terminate Carve-out Relationship with {!Benfit_Request_Form__c.Account__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly: After review of the carve-out Rx integration request for {!Benfit_Request_Form__c.Account__c}, a decision has been made to terminate the carve-out relationship. Please contact your sales director for further action.
